column4: Ok got a little problem here with mdadm, how do i remove a raidarray that can generate a message like this: "/dev/sdd: device 1 in 3 device undetected raid0 /dev/md0.  Use mdadm --examine for more detail." somehow the array is undetected, so how do I remove it? cat /proc/mdtstar gives me this :Personalities : [linear] [multipath] [raid0] [raid1] [raid6] [raid5] [raid4] [raid10]
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
